content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://sadevbrdatalakemalwee.dfs.core.windows.net/raw', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE raw_data.sap_ztsd_modl_001 (
	[MANDT] varchar(8000),
	[CODMOD] varchar(8000),
	[DESCRICAO] varchar(8000),
	[SITUACAO] varchar(8000),
	[DATINI] varchar(8000),
	[DATFIM] varchar(8000),
	[TIPDES] varchar(8000),
	[KSCHL] varchar(8000),
	[PERDES] numeric(38,18),
	[SALMIN] int,
	[DESVEN] varchar(8000),
	[REMDIAS] int,
	[REMPERALT] varchar(8000),
	[SEGQUA] varchar(8000),
	[PERSEL] varchar(8000),
	[ERDAT] varchar(8000),
	[ERZET] varchar(8000),
	[ERNAM] varchar(8000),
	[AEDAT] varchar(8000),
	[AEZET] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'brazil/saptable/ztsd_modl_001/*/*/*/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM raw_data.sap_ztsd_modl_001
GO
